description: The DSC segment is used in the continuation protocol.

fields.name: Continuation Pointer
fields.description: This field contains the continuation pointer. In an initial query, this field is not present. If the responder returns a value of null or not present, then there is no more data to fulfill any future continuation requests. Note that continuation protocols work with both display- and record-oriented messages.

fields.name: Continuation Style
fields.description:
Indicates whether this is a fragmented message, or if it is part of an interactive continuation message.
